edu.ycp.cs201.cards

Class StringifyGameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ycp.cs201.cards.StringifyGameState

  • public class StringifyGameState
extends java.lang.Object
    Convert the game state (as stored in the KlondikeModel) to and from strings. This is useful for testing, since it makes it easy to encode a complete game state as a string. This could also allow games to be saved to and loaded from files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StringifyGameState() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String modelToString(KlondikeModel model)
      Convert the game state stored in the given KlondikeModel object to a string.
      static void stringToModel(KlondikeModel model, java.lang.String s)
      Decode a string (which was returned by some previous call to modelToString(KlondikeModel)) and store the game state it encodes to the given KlondikeModel object.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • StringifyGameState

    • Method Detail

      • modelToString

        public static java.lang.String modelToString(KlondikeModel model)
        Convert the game state stored in the given KlondikeModel object to a string.
        Parameters:
        model - the game state
        Returns:
        a string containing the encoded game state

      • stringToModel

        public static void stringToModel(KlondikeModel model,
                 java.lang.String s)
        Decode a string (which was returned by some previous call to modelToString(KlondikeModel)) and store the game state it encodes to the given KlondikeModel object. The model object must be empty (contain only empty Piles).
        Parameters:
        model - an empty KlondikeModel object
        s - a string containing an encoded game state returned by a previous call to modelToString(KlondikeModel)
